sys_ux_client_script.name: Initial form request data
sys_ux_client_script.script: /** * @param {params} params * @param {api} params.api * @param {any} params.event * @param {any} params.imports * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers */ function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) { const initData = api.data.look_up_a_single_request_record.result; console.log(777777) api.setState('request', { ...api.state.request, authorized_name: initData.authorized_name.value, authorized_position: initData.authorized_position.value, company: initData.company.value, company_corporation: initData.company_corporation.value, coordinator: initData.coordinator, number: initData.number.value, registered_capital: initData.registered_capital.value, request_type: initData.request_type.value, shareholder_capital: initData.shareholder_capital.value, status: initData.status.value, title: initData.title.value, }); }
